title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Fetus taken from womb to perform surgery.” [Headline in Petoskey (Michigan) News-Review, 7 October 1986. Submitted by David L. Miles, Charlevoix, Michigan.]
